personalValues.description: Power is invaluable. After all, it likely enables you to control the people and situations around you. When you're on top making the decision, you feel most yourself.
personalValues.descriptionShared: Power is invaluable. After all, it likely enables you both to control the people and situations around you. For both of you, when you're on top making the decision, you feel most yourself.
personalValues.name: power
personalValues.shortDescription: Control freak? Maybe. But in your eyes it’s more about embracing power, holding dominance and getting the job done. You value social status and prestige.
personalValues.shortDescriptionShared: Control freaks? Maybe. But for both of you it’s more about embracing power, holding dominance and getting the job done. You both value social status and prestige.

personalValues.description: The sense of security that comes with feeling like you belong highly motivates you. Comfort for you is knowing the people and things you cherish are taken care of.
personalValues.descriptionShared: The sense of security that comes with feeling like you belong highly motivates you both. Comfort for both of you is knowing the people and things you cherish are taken care of.
personalValues.name: security
personalValues.shortDescription: A feeling of safety, stability, and order is very important to you; this is true likely whether in society at large, at work, in your home, or in your relationships.
personalValues.shortDescriptionShared: A feeling of safety, stability, and order is very important to you both; this is true likely whether in society at large, at work, in your homes, or in your relationships.

personalValues.description: As a person, you care deeply about humility and accepting your place in the world. Most likely you are a religious person and find following your faith to be very important.
personalValues.descriptionShared: As a person, you both care deeply about humility and accepting your place in the world. Most likely both of you are religious and find following your faith to be very important.
personalValues.name: tradition
personalValues.shortDescription: You value protecting the traditions of your family, community, and/or culture. You likely take pride in this commitment.
personalValues.shortDescriptionShared: You both value protecting the traditions of your family, community, and/or culture. You both likely take pride in this commitment.
